subtitles.original: Yeah, yeah, yeah! この恋、この愛で

subtitles.english: Please find me, my darling.

subtitles.english: Please notice me, my darling.

subtitles.original: 勇気を出して
subtitles.english: Work up the courage.

subtitles.original: 近づく作戦
subtitles.english: Strategy to get closer.

subtitles.original: 手と手が触れて
subtitles.english: Hand in hand, touching.

subtitles.original: 止められない
subtitles.english: I can't stop.

subtitles.original: Yeah, yeah, yeah! この恋、この愛で
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah, yeah! With this love, with this affection...

subtitles.original: メンメンピッと溶けちゃうよ
subtitles.english: I'm melting away!

subtitles.original: ねえねえねえ 気づいてマイダーリン
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, hey, notice me, my darling.

subtitles.original: それは あなた
subtitles.english: It's you.

subtitles.original: Please don't say you are lazy
subtitles.english: Please don't say you are lazy.

subtitles.original: だって 本当は crazy
subtitles.english: Because the truth is, I'm crazy.

subtitles.original: 白鳥たちはそう 見えないとこでバタ足するんです
subtitles.english: Swans, you see, are paddling their feet where they can't be seen.

subtitles.original: 本能に忠実 忠実 翻弄も重々承知
subtitles.english: Faithful to instinct, and well aware of being toyed with.

subtitles.original: 前途洋々だし だからたまに休憩しちゃうんです
subtitles.english: The future is bright, so I take a break once in a while.

subtitles.original: 黒目で見つめられたら 行き先 秩序も真っ白
subtitles.english: When you stare at me with those dark eyes, my destination and order turn pure white.

subtitles.original: 近道あればそれが王道 省ける翼もあれば上等
subtitles.english: If there's a shortcut, that's the royal road; it's fine if I have wings I can save.

subtitles.original: ヤバ 爪割れた ぐるぐる補修した
subtitles.english: Oh no, I broke a nail; I patched it up all over.

subtitles.original: それだけでなんか達成感 大事なのは自分可愛がること
subtitles.english: Just that gives me a sense of accomplishment. The important thing is to be kind to yourself.

subtitles.original: 自分を愛さなきゃ他人も愛せない
subtitles.english: If you don't love yourself, you can't love others.

subtitles.original: Please don't say you are lazy
subtitles.english: Please don't say you are lazy.

subtitles.original: だって 本当は crazy
subtitles.english: Because the truth is, I'm crazy.

subtitles.original: 能ある鷹はそう 見えないとこにピック隠すんです
subtitles.english: A wise hawk, you see, hides its pick where it can't be seen.

subtitles.original: 想像に一生懸命 現実は絶体絶命
subtitles.english: Working hard on imagination, reality is a desperate situation.

subtitles.original: 発展途上だし だから不意にピッチ外れるんです
subtitles.english: I'm still a work in progress, so I occasionally go out of pitch.

subtitles.original: その目に映らないだけだって やる気はメーター振り切っていて
subtitles.english: Just because you can't see it in your eyes, my motivation is off the charts.

subtitles.original: いつでも全力で夢見て その分全力で眠って
subtitles.english: Always dreaming with all my might, and sleeping with all my might as well.

subtitles.original: やべぇ 痩せすぎた 調整して食った
subtitles.english: Oh man, I lost too much weight; I adjusted by eating.

subtitles.original: それだけでなんか敗北感 次なる目標を上方修正して
subtitles.english: Just that gives me a sense of defeat. I'll revise my next goal upwards.

subtitles.original: 柔軟に臨機応変千変万化
subtitles.english: Flexible and adaptable, ever-changing.

subtitles.original: Please don't say you are lazy
subtitles.english: Please don't say you are lazy.

subtitles.original: だって 本当は crazy
subtitles.english: Because the truth is, I'm crazy.

subtitles.original: 孔雀たちはそう
subtitles.english: Peafowls, you see...
